plugin.name: fpsdisplaysink
plugin.description: A custom sink that show the current FPS of the sink on the video screen

element.name: fpsdisplaysink
element.description: Shows the current frame-rate and drop-rate of the xvimagesink on the xvimagesink's video output
element.author: Zeeshan Ali <zeeshan.ali@nokia.com>, Stefan Kost <stefan.kost@nokia.com>
